duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain relationships with departmental and technical decision makers in assigned accounts.
Differentiate and convey compelling value propositions for assigned products/solutions/services.
Forecast orders and sales within applicable sales funnel tools.
Create territory/account plans including opportunity development and competitive strategies.
Maintain up-to-date detailed knowledge of product/solution/services.
Identify and create new opportunities, and work with sales leaders and account teams.
Contribute to account plans at accounts covered by account managers/executives.
Collaborate with subject matter experts and other resources within company channels.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
